item.title: Districtâ€™s history, culture, art, and harmony displayed in Raichur Zilla Ustav 2026: D.K. Shivakumar
item.description:
<![CDATA[Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar said that the Raichur Zilla Utsav 2026 was conducted to lay emphasis on the history of the district. It was successfully organised and sent a message of unity during the three days of cultural events and other programmes, he added.
He was addressing a valedictory function of the utsav, jointly organised by the district administration, zilla panchayat, Kannada and Culture department, and various other government departments at the University of Agriculture a...]]>
item.author: Authors
